name: The Sweater Thief
description:
Controls WalkA and D keys
JumpW keyDrop through cloudsS key Features

Platforming and a game of tag

A mischievous little forest sprite named Otis will attempt to steal Claura's sweater as she navigates the woods between her house and the Sweater Party. If Otis steals Claura's  sweater, she will need to steal it back or the party bouncer won't let attend the party with her friends!

A sunset, autumnal theme with cheery music

Enjoy the seasonal vibes and hand-crafted pixel art as you jump your way through sunset levels propelled by an acoustic ballad.
